author: Artem Nikulchenko
title: Hidden Gems of BigQuery — P6 — Time-traveling and clones
description: This is a series of posts about amazing BigQuery features. Since there are so many of them, some of them can get lost. So, I’ve decided to cover my favorite: Auto, Transactions and Indexes — Hidden gems of BigQuery; Change History and Defaults — Hidden gems of BigQuery — Part 2; Data Lineage and Routines — Hidden gems of BigQuery — Part 3; Views, Caching; Scheduled Queries, Materialized Views — Hidden Gems of BigQuery — Part 4– Five types of “Views”; ML in BigQuery, including new ;Generative AI — BigQuery Breaking News — Generative AI; And this post is about: Time-travel window; Fail-safe period; Snapshots;Clones
